CustomField.description: Represents the Date/Time when the News Article prevents new comments from being added to the News Article. The Time is based on the Organizations Time Zone listed in Salesforce.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Represents the Date/Time when the News Article prevents new comments from being added to the News Article. The Time is based on the Organizations Time Zone listed in Salesforce.
CustomField.label: Comment Expiration Date
